channel.title: Blog on Oscar FDZ

item.title: 5 Songs With A Big Place In My Heart
item.description: Music is a big part of my day to day, of my life even. I love music, I’m completely sure that the world would be drastically worse without music in any kind of form. But that could be said of almost any type of art, I guess that’s why art has such an impactful influence in the world and in human lives, either those who make or those who enjoy it.
